page.title: 05Living in Holmes.
page.content: Holmes is a quiet place with no shops , schools , playing fields , high hills but there is one chapel and a sewage treatment works. There are about 130 people living in the area in 46 houses , 10 farms , 7 market gardens and 4 other businesses , a produce merchant , garage for repairs but no petrol , joiner and haulage firm. The farms are all well over 100 years old. The houses are a mixture , 9 are under 30 years old and 20 houses over 30 years old and 3 uninhabited. Children under 11 go to the C of E school in Merebrow. Over 11 years the children go to Tarleton High school. There are no shops but delivery vans come into the area. If they want bigger things the people go to Southport or Preston.
